videos.description: Brandon Sampson makes dunk after steal against South Carolina.
videos.headline: Brandon Sampson steal results in a dunk

videos.description: Sindarius Thornwell makes 3-pointer to give the Gamecocks a 17 point lead
videos.headline: Sindarius Thornwell, wide open,  makes 3-pointer

videos.description: Antonio Blakeney makes 3-pointer and gets fouled against South Carolina.
videos.headline: Antonio Blakeney makes 3-pointer and gets fouled

videos.description: South Carolina's Chris Silva makes one-handed dunk and LSU's Wayde Sims responds with his own.
videos.headline: Silva, Sims trade one-handed dunks

videos.description: South Carolina head coach Frank Martin talks defense and the team's win over LSU.
videos.headline: Gamecocks stepping up to the plate
